name: Divine Cream Blush: Legendary Glow Color Balm
about: What it is: A glow-boosting cream blush stick that imparts a nourishing veil of glossy, gleaming color...Coverage: Light..Finish: Radiant..Formulation: Stick..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Shea Butter: Antioxidant rich, anti-inflammatory, and boosts skin's moisture..- Squalane: Non-comedogenic, smoothes skin, and help's control oil production..- Passion Fruit Extract: Antioxidant rich, promotes collagen production...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, phthalates, and sulfates SLS & SLES...What Else You Need to Know: This versatile, nongreasy formula suits all skin tones, ensuring the perfect touch of color. Enriched with shea butter, squalane, and passion fruit extract, Divine Blush: Legendary Glow Colour Balm keeps your complexion smooth and supple. Its glossy finish delivers a lustrous, radiant reflection.
ingredients: Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Diisostearyl Malate, Isostearyl Isostearate, Octyldodecanol, Polybutene, Synthetic Wax, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax / Candelilla Cera / CIre De Candelilla, Ozokerite, Silica, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Ethylene Brassylate, Pentaerythrityl Tetradi-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil, Squalane, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter Unsaponifiables, Polyhydroxystearic Acid. (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Soft blush veil: .-Gently swipe or dot the balm onto the apples of the cheek and blend with fingers or brush. .-Blend and diffuse the balm for a sheer effect using either brush and/ or the warmth of the fingertips. ..Rich color saturation: .-Swipe the balm directly onto the face and blend out the edges for bolder blush looks..-Blend with a brush, fingertips, or sponge using tapping gestures to build color intensity...Pat’s tips:.-Swipe the balm from the cheekbones toward the temples and diffuse the color to lift and accentuate bone structure. .-Blend a dot of the balm onto the apples of the cheeks and nose bridge for a sunkissed look. .-Use a fingertip to press balm onto the lips for a sheer wash of color or layer for extra opacity.
